data.title: Account
data.text: The description of having an account is given below:

By subscribing to IRIB, the user acknowledges that he or she has fully read and accepted Irene's rules and regulations. These rules may change over time, and users' continued use of IRI means accepting any changes to the rules and regulations.

To use Irio, you need to create an account in Irio for each user. Anyone of any age and from any country can create an account in Irene. To use Irio, the user can register their name, surname, and username in the Irio software. As a user ID, the mobile number is one of the requirements for registering in Irio
Each person can have multiple accounts with different mobile numbers in the Irio
The user is responsible for all activities performed through the person's account in Irio or other services related to Irio.

It is the responsibility of the user to maintain the security of the user's account information, including username and password. In case of loss or theft of account information, the user is obliged to inform the subject of support as soon as possible. Obviously, the user will be responsible for all activities that take place and can be done through the account until information is provided to the support.

Display a user's name to another user as a priority to complete the S account, so that the priority of the display is: username, first and last name, mobile number in a nutshell, so the user can complete their account information by showing how to display their name Assign to other users

data.title: Coronavirus
data.text: Rules for using Coronavirus
The content of the program is for educational purposes only and should not be considered as medical advice
By entering this section, you have agreed to the rules for using the Corona virus section.

data.title: Competition rules
data.text: Irio organizes periodic competitions to encourage users and people to use Irio. Each course may take a week, or ten days, or a month. In order to participate in each contest and win, users need to score points. Here are some tips to help you get started:

Inviting friends to install and register on the air, any user can score points by inviting any of their friends and increase their chances in the contest. Users who enter their friend's invitation code after registration will also receive points.
The daily wheel of fortune can be scored by chance with the wheel of fortune
By introducing Irio to businesses, you can get the most points
To view active contacts, you must enable permission to contacts on your mobile device for Irio

data.title: Terms and conditions of payment of prizes
data.text: The following are the terms and conditions for winning prizes for the winning users:

After the end of each competition and the winners are determined, if the prize is in cash, the mobile number registered by the winners in the airline will be called and they will receive a night number or card number to deposit the prize money.

After the end of each competition and the winners are determined, if the prize is physical, the mobile number registered by the winners in the airline will be called and they will receive the address and postal code of the house to send.
The contact number that is used to contact the user when winning is the support contact number, either via SMS number 5000260044 or 10002000000 or 5000282829. .
It is the responsibility of the user to submit any errors.

virusTracking.ifYouSick: What To Do if You Are Sick?

symptomsTesting.ifYouTinkCovid: If you think you have been exposed to COVID-19
symptomsTesting.shortnessBreathD: Shortness of breath means shortness of breath, chest tightness, shortness of breath, increased need for air and breath, and severe cases of suffocation.
symptomsTesting.headacheD: One of the new symptoms of coronavirus is headache.
symptomsTesting.coughD: Cough is not a single cough and you cough frequently. Chronic cough is usually dry.
symptomsTesting.highFeverD: Fever can be high. The only way to make sure we have a fever is to use an acupuncturist, and feeling good is not a good measure of judgment. You may have a fever if you do not have a fever tester and if you feel hot by touching your face or chest.
symptomsTesting.source: Source: Arman site (mass and modern national computer training)

preventScreen.avoidBeing: avoid being exposed to this virus
preventScreen.coverMouth: Cover mouth and nose when coughing
preventScreen.source: Source: Ministry of Health of Iran, Treatment and Medical Education website
